g1.title: Enterprise Database Integration Suite
g1.description: Build comprehensive database integration layer supporting PostgreSQL, SQL Server, Oracle, MongoDB with connection pooling, transaction management, and failover capabilities
g1.notes: Must include real connection strings, connection pooling, transaction handling, and comprehensive error recovery

g2.title: Cloud Services Integration Hub
g2.description: Implement integration layer for AWS, Azure, GCP services including storage, messaging, compute with proper authentication, retry logic, and monitoring
g2.notes: Real AWS SDK, Azure SDK, GCP SDK integration with credential management and service discovery

g3.title: Message Queue & Event Streaming
g3.description: Build robust messaging integration for RabbitMQ, Apache Kafka, Azure Service Bus, AWS SQS with dead letter handling and guaranteed delivery
g3.notes: Production-ready with consumer groups, partition handling, and automatic scaling

g4.title: API Gateway & Service Mesh Integration
g4.description: Implement integration layer for Kong, Istio, Consul Connect, Linkerd with service discovery, load balancing, and circuit breakers
g4.notes: Real service mesh integration with health checks and automatic failover

technical_requirements.language_specific_safety: Thread safety with async/await patterns and proper cancellation token handling
technical_requirements.resource_management: Connection pooling, proper disposal patterns, and resource cleanup
technical_requirements.resilience_patterns: Circuit breakers, retry policies with exponential backoff, bulkhead isolation
technical_requirements.security_standards: TLS 1.3, OAuth2/OIDC, encrypted secrets management, certificate validation
technical_requirements.logging_framework: Microsoft.Extensions.Logging with structured logging and correlation IDs
technical_requirements.configuration_pattern: IOptions pattern with validation, hot reload, and environment-specific configs
